chat-portrait.portrait-size-l: Configure portrait image size on the chat messages. Default is 36
chat-portrait.border-shape-l: Configure border shape of the portraits displayed on the chat messages.
chat-portrait.border-color-l: Use the actor's player's color for the border of the entire chat message
chat-portrait.token-image-l: Use the actor's Token image instead of the actor's standard image.
chat-portrait.force-name-search-l: If there is no Actor matching with chat message data, search for an actor of which name corresponds to the message speaker's alias. This option is needed for the compatibility with Theatre Insert module.
